short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulates: Copy + Open new tab + Paste + Enter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that simulates Copy + Open new tab + Paste + Enter.

Usage:
1. Select some text
2. Press Shift+T

If the selected text starts with http or https it will open up a new tab asuming it's an URL.
If not, it will search the selected text in Google.
